module.name: closest-blob
module.description: Extracts brightest blob in a sequence of disparity images
module.copypolicy: Released under the terms of the GNU GPL v2.0
module.description-long: This module takes as input a grayscale image and outputs the brightest blob both as a binary image and as an extracted rectangular crop around it, plus the blob centroid's coordinates and approximated area.

input.description: Gets the disparity input stream from the datasetplayer.
Gets the camera input stream from the datasetplayer.

output.description: Streams out the image of selected blob.
Streams out the cropped image of selected blob.
Coordinates of the TL and BR points of the ROI around the selected blob
